body_html:
I found that the following option in .tf_configure.bazelrc raises the above LNK1181 error.
This option is automatically added by configure.py.
So we should manually remove this option before build.

build --config monolithic

body:
I found that the following option in .tf_configure.bazelrc raises the above LNK1181 error.
This option is automatically added by configure.py.
So we should manually remove this option before build.
``` 
build --config monolithic
```
